name: Rossignol Control Step-In Bindings - Unisex
description: Sport/touring bindings with an automatic step-in function to get you off touring while the snow’s still good. Manual release gets you out just while the hot chocolate’s still warm.Flex index is designed for classic skiing to promote power transfer and ski control (5.0 flex index; 45° amplitude).Step-in design automatically clicks closed. Manual release to open.Low profile stack height ensures maximum stability through the gliding phase and direct snow feel for increased precision.Compatible with IFP mounting plate only.
